name: A-Z
descr: The first serious project. A small text puzzle game based on the alphabet. Written on Kotlin. The Volley library was used to make HTTP requests to the web leaderboard.

name: Camo Tracker
descr: Camo Tracker for Call of Duty Black Ops Cold War. Built with MERN stack. Authentication is made using JWT tokens. User progress is managed by Redux and stored in MongoDB. Design is adapted for desktop and mobile devices. Hosted on Heroku

name: Whiteboard
descr: A test project for learn websockets. A simple collaborative whiteboard for planning something together or just drawing with a friend. Work in progress...

name: Rick and Morty Characters Wiki
descr: A test project for typescript practice. The user can view information about a character, search by character name, type, species, and filter by status and gender. Hosted on Vercel

name: Image Editor
descr: The web analog of the Snipping Tool app. The user can upload an image using a file or from the clipboard and mark some important detail on the image. The edited image can be saved or copied to the clipboard.
